scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run watch
scripts.dist: mkdirp dist && npm run build:prod && tar -czf dist/holisticon.tar.gz dist/holisticon/ && cp package.json dist/holisticon/
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:end2end
scripts.test:end2end: mkdirp target && node bin/jasmine.js && npm run protractor --
scripts.lint:fix: npm run prettier && npm run lint -- --fix
scripts.clean: npm i && rm -rf dist/ && mkdirp dist/holisticon
scripts.changelog: mkdirp dist/holisticon && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/holisticon/
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release: npm run dist && npm run test && npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
